actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

official_title: A bill to clarify authority of the Secretary of the Interior to cooperate with non-Federal entities in the conduct of research concerning the National Park System, and for other purposes

summary.text: Amends Federal law to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to: (1) enter into cooperative agreements with public or private educational institutions, States and local governments, or any public or private person or entity in order to develop adequate, coordinated, cooperative research and training programs concerning the resources of the National Park System; and (2) accept from and make available to the cooperator technical and support staff, financial assistance, supplies and equipment, facilities, and administrative services relating to cooperative research units.

titles.title: A bill to clarify authority of the Secretary of the Interior to cooperate with non-Federal entities in the conduct of research concerning the National Park System, and for other purposes
